fr.lri.swingstates.sm.transitions

Class KeyTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.Transition
      • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.transitions.KeyTransition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeyPress, KeyRelease, KeyType

    public abstract class KeyTransition
extends Transition
    A transition triggered by a key event. Keys can be specified either by the ASCII character they represent or by their keycode.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyTransition()
      Builds a transition triggered by a key event with any modifier that loops on the current state.
